content.text: Wrap yourself in the true epitome of luxurious 100% cotton towels and linen by the respected UK designer Claire Aitch
Who can resist the temptation and comfort of this trilogy of chocolate coloured cushions? Deep filled for ultimate comfort and so frilly!
For fans of minimalism we have the classic black and white bed set by new designer Kay Lea. 2 pillow cases, quilt cover and sheet.
A  taste of the exotic with this hand made Turkish rug and matching cushion in stain resistant, softened 100% cotton.
